house_listing.description: Single family home, NEEDS TO BE REBUILT in Cupertino with Monta Vista school. Lot 9,375 Sq.ft. House not on market/WILL HAVE MORE INFORMATION IN ABOUT 2 WEEKS. Please call (and be patient)for more info. 408 345-3149. Thank you, Y.C. Cheung
